Name: Memorise'n'run
About the game: Challenge your ability, your reflexes and your memory to avoid from the shots while you solve a memory game, because in Memorise'n'Run you need to memorize the cards while survive of a real bullet hell. Features: - Differentiated gameplay; - High re-playability; - 50 challenging stages; - Rank system;
